rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC2000, ECC5900, ECF5927} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC3670} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: Characteristics and experience of developing countries; theories of economic growth and development; domestic and external sources of financial and human resources for development; the roles of international trade, investment, technology manufacturing and government in the development process.
